abstract: Bloomberg News’s Matthew Lynn has a bone to pick with the hedge fund industry. The columnist feels that the way it has been defending itself against the proposed threat of increased regulation on both sides of the Atlantic is “truly lamentable.”
snippet: Bloomberg News’s Matthew Lynn has a bone to pick with the hedge fund industry. The columnist feels that the way it has been defending itself against the proposed threat of increased regulation on both sides of the Atlantic is “truly lamentable.”
lead_paragraph: Bloomberg News’s Matthew Lynn has a bone to pick with the hedge fund industry. The columnist feels that the way it has been defending itself against the proposed threat of increased regulation on both sides of the Atlantic is “truly lamentable.”

headline.main: Do Hedge Funds Need a New Script?
